definition: it may be assumed that
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: If we think about it, wind chill is an ill-defined concept.
sentences.chinese: 仔细想来，风寒是一个定义不清楚的概念。

sentences.english: Hollywood is the best if you want to come, have a good time, party,
sentences.chinese: 你要想来好好玩，聚会，好莱坞再好不过了。

sentences.english: Henry racked his brains trying to remember where he left his key.
sentences.chinese: 亨利想来想去，试图回忆起他把钥匙放在什么地方了。

sentences.english: It is sad to think that the love of a mother can possess villainous aspects.
sentences.chinese: 一个慈母的爱会有它丑恶的一面，想来真使人失望。

sentences.english: I sing these songs to thank them.
sentences.chinese: 我唱这些歌想来感谢他们。

sentences.english: so I wanted to come here and have like  a really good experience.
sentences.chinese: 所以我想来这里，能够获取美好的经历。

sentences.english: Jessica was transferred from the warehouse to the accounting office, which was considered a promotion.
sentences.chinese: 杰西卡从仓库调到了会计室，想来应该算是一种升职。

sentences.english: G: No, this time I want a cup of tonic water.
sentences.chinese: 不，这次我想来一杯汤力水。

sentences.english: Puppet want to visit the palace, how walk, see chart below.
sentences.chinese: 想来参观伪满皇宫，怎么走？请看下图。

sentences.english: I saw your ad* in the paper and wanted to apply for the job.
sentences.chinese: 我看到你们在报纸上登的广告想来应聘这个工作。

sentences.english: Later, he was reinstated so many people remembered him again and wanted to visit him.
sentences.chinese: 再到后来，翟公恢复了官职，很多人又想来他家拜访。

sentences.english: We'll have a party this evening. Would you like to join us?
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上我么有一个晚会，你想来参加吗？

sentences.english: Would you like some clear soup or thick soup?
Werder Bremen striker Miroslav Klose has again declared an ambition to play in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 克洛泽再次表达说他想来意大利踢球的愿望。

sentences.english: Come and see me whenever you want to .
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候想来见我都可以。

sentences.english: Louis: And I'd like a grilled squid on a stick if we can find it.
sentences.chinese: 假如我们能找到烤鱿鱼的话，我也想来一份。

definition: presumably/probably/in all likelihood/surely
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
moreover/besides/in addition/furthermore
perhaps
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
fear/to dread/I'm afraid that.../perhaps/maybe
it seems/it looks as if
honestly speaking/to be frank, ...
to take seriously/serious/No joking, really!
most/mostly/most likely
to appear to be/to seem as if
though/although
